tool_description: Information about Charities, using IRS Data.
name: CharityAPI
title: CharityAPI

api_list.name: Get Nonprofit
api_list.description: Returns information about a nonprofit based on the given EIN (Tax ID Number)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://charityapi.p.rapidapi.com/organizations/474262060"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "charityapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://charityapi.p.rapidapi.com/organizations/{ein}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "charityapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search Nonprofits
api_list.description: Search all nonprofits by name, city, etc. Provide a search term.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://charityapi.p.rapidapi.com/organizations/search/redcross"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "charityapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://charityapi.p.rapidapi.com/organizations/search/{term}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "charityapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
